notifications.title: Title
notifications.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-not: Are you sure you want to delete this notification?
notifications.please-provide-a-title-or-message: Please provide a title or message.
notifications.please-select-at-least-one-user-to-notif: Please select at least one user to notify.

users.are-you-sure-you-want-to-delete-this-use: Are you sure you want to delete this user?

error.info-text-1: Something didn't work and we don't know why...
error.info-text-2: Please try again or contact us!

emailRevoked.info-text-1: Too bad you go! We would have liked to stay together longer, but we understand your decision.
emailRevoked.info-text-2: If you change your mind, you can always write us an email to {{{contactlink}}} so that we can restore your account.

emailConfirmed.info-text-1: You have successfully confirmed your email address!
emailConfirmed.info-text-2: You will be forwarded automatically in 5 seconds...

confirmEmail.info-text-1: your account with the Choreo Planner was created with {{userEmail}}. Please confirm your email address now!
confirmEmail.info-text-2: If the link above does not work, you can open the following URL in your browser:

general.auto-email-info: This email was created automatically. Please do not respond to this email. Better write your answer to info@choreoplaner.de. Thank you!
general.goodbye: We wish you a lot of fun and success with your next project!
general.sender:
Dancing greetings,
Andreas Nicklaus
Choreo Planner Team

newFeedback.info-text-1: {{username}} has just given a feedback!

newNotification.info-text-1: You have received a new notification in your Choreo Planner. To read it, please click on the following link:
newNotification.info-text-2: You have received this email because you have registered with Choreo Planner. As a rule, you will get notifications if an administrator wants to send you a message.
newNotification.info-text-3: If you are not sure whether this email really comes from us, please contact us at admin@choreoplaner.de or via Instagram an @choreoplaner.
newNotification.jetzt-einloggen-und-nachricht-lesen: Now log in and read the message

ssoLogin.info-text-1: You get this email because you have requested a login link. You can now log in via this link:
ssoLogin.info-text-2: If you have not requested the link, you can confidently ignore this email. If you get emails like this very often, it can be a sign that someone is trying to get into your account. In this case, please contact our administrators immediately at admin@choreoplaner.de, even if you are not sure.

welcome.erste-schritte-step-1: GettingStarted: Visit our website and start directly with your first choreography. Everything is designed intuitively and uncomplicated.
welcome.erste-schritte-step-2: Discover the possibilities: whether for small groups or large performances - the Choreo Planer offers you everything you need.
welcome.info-text-1: Welcome to the Choreo Planner - your free online tool for dance, cheerleading, floor gymnastics and much more!
welcome.info-text-2: We look forward to having you on board! With our tool you can easily and creatively plan, organize and visualize your choreographies.
welcome.info-text-3: Our tool is not only free of charge, we also value data protection: your data is yours and we do not sell or share. If you accidentally created your account or want to undo the registration, just click here:
welcome.wenn-du-fragen-hast-oder-unterstuetzung-: If you have any questions or need support, just write us at:
